useCase.name: Restrict Access to Files by IP Address

mainSequence.step: UI sends a request to the Backend Server for restriction options
Backend Server retrieves current access settings from the Database
Database returns the current access settings to Backend Server
Backend Server displays current settings and IP restriction options to UI
Archivist applies IP restrictions by entering an IP range in the UI
UI sends an update access settings request with IP details to the Backend Server
Backend Server updates file access settings with the IP restrictions in the Database
Database confirms that the settings have been updated to the Backend Server
Backend Server displays a success message to the UI
UI confirms to the Archivist that the IP restriction has been implemented
